meta.description: CSH labels for the Recommendation table of WEC Assessment

languageKey.label: A category acts as a grouping for a set of questions and recommendations.
You can choose to hide this category to keep it and all associated questions and recommendations hidden from the Frontend.
You must give the category a title. This field is required.
Although the description field is optional, it gives your Frontend users an idea about what the category contains.
You can add a related image to the category. Options for the image's display can be adjusted through the CSS file.
You can add questions for the curent category.
You can add recommendations for the current category.
